email.description: The email address of the participant, never shown externally

displayName.description: The name of the participant to use as a Discord nickname

name.description: The full name of the participant, never shown externally

id.description: The id number of the participant, never shown externally

url.description: The unique server invite link of the participant

code.description: The invite link's unique code, shown so that admins can map Discord users and arbitrary codes to hidden private IDs
